meanings.definition: A stretchy material used for securing items or clothing in place.
meanings.sent1: I used elastics to tie my hair back.
meanings.sent2: She wore elastics around her wrist to keep her keys handy.
meanings.sent3: The elastics on the package were so tight, I couldn't open it!
meanings.sent4: His trust in her was like the strength of elastics, always bouncing back.
meanings.sent5: The elastics on the mask made it snug and secure on his face.

meanings.definition: A type of band or cord made of elastic material.
meanings.sent1: The elastics on his braces helped straighten his teeth.
meanings.sent2: She sewed elastics onto the bedsheet to keep it in place.
meanings.sent3: The elastics on the pants were so colorful, they looked like a rainbow!
meanings.sent4: The elastics of friendship kept them connected no matter the distance.
meanings.sent5: The elastics on the hat ensured a snug fit for any head size.

meanings.definition: The quality of being able to stretch and return to its original shape.
meanings.sent1: The elastics in the waistband of the pants allowed for easy movement.
meanings.sent2: The elastics in the rubber band made it snap back into place.
meanings.sent3: The elastics in the slingshot gave the pebble an extra bounce!
meanings.sent4: Her resilience was like the elastics in a rubber ball, always bouncing back.
meanings.sent5: The elastics in the fabric made it perfect for sportswear that needed flexibility.
